name: MyVest
overview:
MyVest was formed in 2001 by a team of top technology, investment management, and securities operations professionals who are deeply familiar with the limitations of front, middle, and back office processes and technologies. The team developed the Strategic Portfolio System, plus a full turnkey service.

Collectively, MyVest’s team has developed front office and tax software used by millions of financial professionals and individuals, created middle and back office solutions used by top financial institutions worldwide to process and custody trillions of dollars of assets daily, and managed hundreds of billions of dollars of assets owned by both institutional and private investors.
